snippet: The opposition leader, Anwar Ibrahim, denounced the charge as an attempt to weaken his appeal of a sodomy conviction and orchestrate his return to prison.
abstract: N Surendran, lawyer for Malaysian opposition leader Anwar Ibrahim, is charged with sedition; Anwar denounces move as part of a conspiracy to weaken his appeal of a sodomy conviction and orchestrate his return to prison.
lead_paragraph: The opposition leader, Anwar Ibrahim, denounced the charge as an attempt to weaken his appeal of a sodomy conviction and orchestrate his return to prison.

headline.main: Lawyer for Malaysian Opposition Leader Is Charged With Sedition
headline.print_headline: Malaysia: Opposition Lawyer Charged With Sedition
